text: Ride with the Rasses is the fifth album by Jamaican reggae artist Lincoln Thompson. The album was released 1982. ==Track listing== # "One Common Need" # "Kinky Money Game" # "Come Spring" # "Fall Back" # "The Brotherhood Of Man" # "Ride With The Rasses" # "No Future At All" ==Personnel== * Drums: Michael "Boo" Richards * Bass: Errol "Bagga" Walker * Guitar: George Miller * Lead Guitar: Lawrence White * Keyboards: Pablo Black * Percussion: Duke Ferron Category:1982 albums Category:Lincoln Thompson albums
title: Ride with the Rasses
